subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Wolverines have reached the N.C.A.A. tournament for the first time since 1998 with an offense in which four players spread along the arc, ready to take a 3-pointer.
snippet: The Wolverines have reached the N.C.A.A. tournament for the first time since 1998 with an offense in which four players spread along the arc, ready to take a 3-pointer.
